dcterms:creator: Stephanie C. Lin
Jacob Hilton
Owain Evans
dcterms:description: The TruthfulQA dataset contains 817 distinct examples, each with a single query and a variable number of correct and incorrect answers, used to evaluate the performance of language models in generating accurate responses.
dcterms:title: TruthfulQA Dataset

dcterms:creator: Stephanie C. Lin
Jacob Hilton
Owain Evans
dcterms:description: DMC is the dataset containing all distinct (query, answer) pairs from the TruthfulQA dataset, used for calculating various evaluation metrics.
dcterms:title: DMC

dcterms:creator: Stephanie C. Lin
Jacob Hilton
Owain Evans
dcterms:description: DDPO is the set of every distinct (query, answer, incorrect answer) triple contained in the DMC dataset, used for calculating the DPO metric.
dcterms:title: DDPO

dcterms:creator: Stephanie C. Lin
Jacob Hilton
Owain Evans
dcterms:description: DICL is the set of every distinct (query, answer) pair contained in the DMC dataset, used for drawing contexts for evaluation.
dcterms:title: DICL
